Header: 1,000 million rupees for Monaragala town development
Content: Minister Ranjith Madduma Bandara says that maximum measures have been taken to ensure security of the country. He said that laws against terrorism should be further strengthened. A discussion was held at the Monaragala District Secretariat on the development of Monaragala town under the patronage of the Minister. 1,000 million rupees has been allocated for the Monaragala town development project. The project has been planned to be completed within two years. Meanwhile the Minister attended a function to pay compensation for the farmers in Siyambalanduwa area whose cultivation have been destroyed by Sena Caterpillar. 840 farmers were paid nearly 60 million rupees as compensation.
